Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with delays at Clark/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks .

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with delays at Clark/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks .

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#22 Clark

#24 Wentworth

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
